description: Extensions at basement level and construction of a second storey infill extension at first and second floor levels (fronting Inglebert Street) to create  6 x self-contained flats. (2 x studio/ bedsit flats and 4 x 1 bedroom single person flats). Creation of lightwell to Inglebert Street elevation along with associated alterations.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed development, due to its design and location, would have a serious negative impact on the character and appearance of the Grade II Listed building, street scene, and the wider New River Conservation Area. The proposal is contrary to policies D1 (Overall Design), D3 (Site Planning), D4 (Designing in Context), D8 (Boundary Walls, Paving, and Street Furniture), D11 (Alterations and Extensions), D22 (New Development), D26 / D27 (Side Extensions), D28 (Rear Extensions) of Islington's Unitary Development Plan (2002), Islington's Urban Design Guide (2006), Islington's New River Conservation Area Design Guidelines (2002), and Planning Policy Guidance 15: Planning and the Historic Environment.
